## Two images {.double-image}
Add '{.double-image}' to the header to create a layout with two equal-width images side by side. If you want text on the slide above the images, wrap them in a div with class "image-wrap."

## Text and image {.img-right}
<div class="text">
Add '{.img-right}' to the header to create a layout with the image on the right and text on the left. '{.img-left}' will put the image on the left and text on the right. Be sure to wrap the text in a div with a class of "text".
